Description: Southern Province Cement (known as: SPCC) is a public company, listed on Saudi Stock Exchange “Tadawul” (TDWL) since January 1993. SPCC operates within the Materials sector focusing on Construction Materials. It has Companies operating across Saudi Arabia, working on Trading Companies and Distributors, Independent Power Producers and Energy Traders and Construction Materials. SPCC is based in Abha, Saudi Arabia and was established in January 1978.
